info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Robeson, northwestern Dillon and east central Marlboro Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clio, or 11 miles south of Laurinburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Rowland, Raemon, Hamer, South Of The Border, Little Rock and Minturn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 189 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina.
